title: Atomik x BERD ALGR aluminum gravel wheels prove you don’t need carbon for compliance
content:
Once again, Atomik Carbon’s latest wheelset doesn’t actually use a carbon fiber rim. After adding premium aluminum mountain bike wheels to their repertoire, Atomik turned their focus to aluminum wheels for gravel – but with a twist. An ultra high molecular weight polyethylene twist. At this point, outside of the spoke company themselves, Atomik has […]

The post Atomik x BERD ALGR aluminum gravel wheels prove you don’t need carbon for compliance appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
